name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Amane Kanata 1st Solo Live ＂LOCK ON＂ 有明アリーナ [DpYSUe6Ca9o]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Title screen for Amane Kanata's 1st Solo Live "LOCK ON" at Ariake Arena.
Attention screen displaying venue rules and safety information.
Promotional screen for the 2nd round of concert merchandise sales.
Montage of fan messages and illustrations scrolling over the live concert logo.

subtitles.original: Amane Kanata 1st Solo Live "LOCK ON" ARIAKE ARENA
subtitles.english: Amane Kanata 1st Solo Live "LOCK ON" ARIAKE ARENA

subtitles.original: ATTENTION ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.

subtitles.original: Amane Kanata 1st Solo Live "LOCK ON" 2次販売グッズ
